018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
024
025import org.apiguardian.api.API;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.NullArgumentException;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGDegree;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGMillimeter;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPercent;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPixel;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGUserUnitValue;
035
036/**
037 *  <p>{@summary The class {@code SVGCalculator} provide functions to perform
038 *  calculations on instances of
039 *  {@link SVGNumber }
040 *  and its subclasses.}</p>
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: SVGCalculator.java 1140 2024-06-23 11:17:41Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.4.7
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGCalculator.java 1140 2024-06-23 11:17:41Z tquadrat $" )
049@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
050@UtilityClass
051public final class SVGCalculator
052{
053        /*--------------*\
054    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
055        \*--------------*/
056    /**
057     *  No instance allowed for this class!
058     */
059    private SVGCalculator() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( SVGCalculator.class ); }
060
061        /*---------*\
062    ====** Methods **==========================================================
063        \*---------*/
064    /**
065     *  Adds the given values.
066     *
067     *  @param  <T> The type of the values.
068     *  @param  v1  The first value.
069     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
070     *  @return The sum.
071     *
072     *  @since  0.4.8
073     */
074    @SafeVarargs
075    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
076    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T add( final T v1, final T... vOther )
077    {
078        var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue();
079        final var unit = v1.unit();
080        for( final var v : vOther )
081        {
082            if( unit != v.unit() ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Invalid unit: %s".formatted( v.unit().name() ) );
083            sum += v.number().doubleValue();
084        }
085        @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
086        final var retValue = (T) switch( unit )
087        {
088            case PIXEL -> new SVGPixel( sum );
089            case MILLIMETER -> new SVGMillimeter( sum );
090            case PERCENT -> new SVGPercent( sum );
091            default -> v1 instanceof SVGDegree ? new SVGDegree( sum ) : new SVGNumber( sum, unit );
092        };
093
094        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
095        return retValue;
096    }   //  add
097
098    /**
099     *  Adds the given values.
100     *
101     *  @param  v1  The first value.
102     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
103     *  @return The sum.
104     *
105     *  @since  0.4.8
106     */
107    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
108    public static final SVGDegree add( final SVGDegree v1, final SVGDegree... vOther )
109    {
110        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
111        final var retValue = new SVGDegree( sum );
112
113        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
114        return retValue;
115    }   //  add
116
117    /**
118     *  Adds the given values.
119     *
120     *  @param  v1  The first value.
121     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
122     *  @return The sum.
123     *
124     *  @since  0.4.8
125     */
126    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
127    public static final SVGMillimeter add( final SVGMillimeter v1, final SVGMillimeter... vOther )
128    {
129        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
130        final var retValue = new SVGMillimeter( sum );
131
132        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
133        return retValue;
134    }   //  add
135
136    /**
137     *  Adds the given values.
138     *
139     *  @param  v1  The first value.
140     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
141     *  @return The sum.
142     *
143     *  @since  0.4.8
144     */
145    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
146    public static final SVGPixel add( final SVGPixel v1, final SVGPixel... vOther )
147    {
148        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
149        final var retValue = new SVGPixel( sum );
150
151        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
152        return retValue;
153    }   //  add
154
155    /**
156     *  Adds the given values.
157     *
158     *  @param  v1  The first value.
159     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
160     *  @return The sum.
161     *
162     *  @since  0.4.8
163     */
164    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
165    public static final SVGPercent add( final SVGPercent v1, final SVGPercent... vOther )
166    {
167        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
168        final var retValue = new SVGPercent( sum );
169
170        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
171        return retValue;
172    }   //  add
173
174    /**
175     *  Increases the given instance of
176     *  {@link SVGNumber}
177     *  by the given increment and returns the result.
178     *
179     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
180     *  @param  value   The value.
181     *  @param  increment   The increment.
182     *  @return The result.
183     */
184    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
185    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T increase( final T value, final double increment )
186    {
187        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() + increment;
188        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
189
190        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
191        return retValue;
192    }   //  increase()
193
194    /**
195     *  Multiplies the given instance of
196     *  {@link SVGNumber}
197     *  with the given factor and returns the result.
198     *
199     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
200     *  @param  value   The value.
201     *  @param  factor  The factor.
202     *  @return The result.
203     */
204    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
205    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T multiply( final T value, final double factor )
206    {
207        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() * factor;
208        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
209
210        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
211        return retValue;
212    }   //  multiply()
213
214    /**
215     *  Creates a new instance of
216     *  {@link SVGNumber}
217     *  with the given type and amount.
218     *
219     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
220     *  @param  value   The value.
221     *  @param  amount  The amount.
222     *  @return The result.
223     */
224    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
225    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.4.7" )
226    private static final <T extends SVGNumber> T newNumber( final T value, final double amount )
227    {
228        final var retValue = switch( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) )
229        {
230            case final SVGDegree $ -> (T) new SVGDegree( amount );
231            case final SVGMillimeter $ -> (T) new SVGMillimeter( amount );
232            case final SVGPercent $ -> (T) new SVGPercent( amount );
233            case final SVGPixel $ -> (T) new SVGPixel( amount );
234            case final SVGUserUnitValue $ -> (T) new SVGUserUnitValue( amount );
235            default -> (T) new SVGNumber( amount, value.unit() );
236        };
237
238        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
239        return retValue;
240    }   //  newNumber()
241
242    /**
243     *  Reduces the given instance of
244     *  {@link SVGNumber}
245     *  by the given decrement and returns the result.
246     *
247     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
248     *  @param  value   The value.
249     *  @param  decrement   The decrement.
250     *  @return The result.
251     */
252    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
253    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T reduce( final T value, final double decrement )
254    {
255        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() - decrement;
256        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
257
258        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
259        return retValue;
260    }   //  reduce()
261
262    /**
263     *  Returns an instance of
264     *  {@link SVGMillimeter}
265     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
266     *
267     *  @param  input   The input value.
268     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMillimeter}.
269     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
270     *      to an instance of {@code SVGMillimeter}.
271     */
272    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
273    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
274    public static final SVGMillimeter toMillimeter( final SVGNumber input )
275    {
276        final var retValue = switch( input )
277        {
278            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
279            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
280            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
281            case final SVGMillimeter value -> value;
282            case final SVGPixel value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
283            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
284            default -> switch( input.unit() )
285            {
286                case INCH -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 );
287                case PICA -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 12.7 / 3.0 );
288                case POINT -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 0.352778 );
289                case CENTIMETER -> input.isInteger()
290                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() * 10 )
291                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() *10.0 );
292                case MILLIMETER -> input.isInteger()
293                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() )
294                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() );
295                case PIXEL -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
296                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
297            };
298        };
299
300        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
301        return retValue;
302    }   //  toMillimeter()
303
304    /**
305     *  Returns an instance of
306     *  {@link SVGPixel}
307     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
308     *
309     *  @param  input   The input value.
310     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMPixel}.
311     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
312     *      to an instance of {@code SVGPixel}.
313     */
314    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
315    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
316    public static final SVGPixel toPixel( final SVGNumber input )
317    {
318        final var retValue = switch( input )
319        {
320            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
321            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
322            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
323            case final SVGMillimeter value -> new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
324            case final SVGPixel value -> value;
325            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> value.isInteger()
326                ? new SVGPixel( value.number().longValue() )
327                : new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() );
328            default -> switch( input.unit() )
329            {
330                case INCH -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 );
331                case PICA -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 16.0 );
332                case POINT -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 6.0 / 8.0 );
333                case CENTIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 960.0 / 25.4 );
334                case MILLIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
335                case PIXEL -> input.isInteger()
336                    ? new SVGPixel( input.number().longValue() )
337                    : new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() );
338                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
339            };
340        };
341
342        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
343        return retValue;
344    }   //  toMillimeter()
345}
346//  class SVGCalculator
347
348/*
349 *  End of File
